Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss why the state of Georgia is cursed as Ross denounces all of his sports teams until they win a championship, the Big Ten football is back, we break down Week 7 NFL spreads and College Football odds, and "Fake Dan" gives his odd lock of the week.
